description: Installation of new shopfront along Clerkenwell Road.  Installation of new shop front and security shutters at rear courtyard.  Removal of Condition 23 of Developer's Planning Consent ref: P051898.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The following features are to be provided as required by the Local Planning Authority to aid access and usability of accommodation for people with disabilities. 

WC (s) to building Regulations Part M 
Platform lift to provide access to the basement 
Level or ramped access to external entrances  

 Full details of these and all other features required to provide adequate access and facilities for people with disabilities shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The development shall be carried out strictly in accordance with the details so approved, maintained as such thereafter and no change there from shall take place without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

 REASON: To ensure that the premises can be used by people with disabilities.
